mapper.insert: insert into member(memberid, pwd, name, gender, is_lunar, phone, email, joindate) values(#{memberid}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{is_lunar}, #{phone}, #{email}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where memberid=#{param1}
select count(*) from member where memberid=#{param1} and pwd=#{param2}
select memberid, pwd, name, gender, is_lunar, phone, email, joindate from member where userid=#{memberid}
